text: Aleksandr Geirot () was a Russian actor and painter. Honored Artist of the RSFSR. == Selected filmography == * 1916 — Dikaya sila * 1925 — The Marriage of the Bear * 1930 — St. Jorgen's Day ==References== == External links == * Александр Гейрот on kino-teatr.ru * Category:Russian male film actors Category:20th-century Russian male actors
title: Aleksandr Geirot
